awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.

fullplot: Doc McCoy has been granted parole. The catch is that Sheriff Beynon expects a small favor from McCoy for his generosity: robbing another bank! Beynon does not really intend to let McCoy walk away after the heist and neither does co-robber Rudy Butler, but stopping Doc proves a trifle difficult.
plot: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.
title: The Getaway
